tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE stock_prices (
    symbol VARCHAR,
    date DATE,
    open_price DECIMAL,
    high_price DECIMAL,
    low_price DECIMAL,
    close_price DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE stock_prices (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    symbol VARCHAR(50),
    price DECIMAL,
    date DATE,
    volume INT
);

CREATE TABLE historical_stock_data (
    symbol VARCHAR(10),
    date DATE,
    open_price DECIMAL,
    close_price DECIMAL,
    high_price DECIMAL,
    low_price DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE historical_stock_prices (
  timestamp TIMESTAMP PRIMARY KEY,
  stock_symbol VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
  opening_price DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  closing_price DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  volume INTEGER NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE stock_symbols (
  symbol_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  symbol_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE
)

CREATE TABLE stock_exchanges (
  exchange_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  exchange_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE stock_traders (
  trader_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  trader_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  trader_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
)
